story:
Once upon a time, in the vast and beautiful land of Sudan, there lived a little giraffe named Jamal. Jamal was known far and wide for his kindness and bravery. Every night, before bedtime, Jamal loved to gaze up at the twinkling stars in the sky and listen to the gentle rustle of the trees.


One night, as Jamal was preparing to go to bed, he heard a soft whimpering sound coming from a nearby thicket. Curious, Jamal approached the thicket and discovered a tiny rabbit trapped in a thorn bush. Without hesitation, Jamal used his long neck to carefully reach in and gently free the rabbit.


The grateful rabbit, whose name was Layla, thanked Jamal with tears of joy in her eyes. From that night on, Jamal and Layla became the best of friends. They spent their days exploring the savannah, playing games, and watching the glorious sunsets together.


One evening, as they were watching the sun dip below the horizon, Layla asked Jamal why he was always so kind and brave. Jamal replied, "Kindness and bravery are like the stars in the sky â€“ they guide us on our path and light up the darkness. We should always strive to be kind and brave, no matter what challenges we may face."


And so, under the gentle glow of the moon and stars, Jamal and Layla drifted off to sleep, knowing that their friendship and acts of kindness would always shine brightly in their hearts.


As you drift off to sleep, remember the tale of Jamal and Layla, and know that kindness and bravery are qualities that will always lead you on the right path. Sweet dreams, little one.
